alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; Guadalupe County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 6:02PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN SAN MIGUEL, SOUTHERN SANTA FE, WEST CENTRAL GUADALUPE, BERNALILLO AND NORTHERN TORRANCE COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM MDT... At 602 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Tajique to 10 miles northeast of Estancia to 11 miles northeast of Encino. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Edgewood, Moriarty, Estancia, McIntosh, Escabosa, Clines Corners, Tajique, Chilili, Cedro and Ponderosa Pines. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 189 and 247. Highway 285 between Mile Markers 230 and 255. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; Guadalupe County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood
